aboutDescription: My name is xxxxxxxxx, I recently graduated with a degree in Computer Systems Engineering from the Autonomous University of Aguascalientes. During my time at university, I participated in cybersecurity hackathons, data analysis courses, competitive programming, and organized various activities for the university community.
experienceDescription: I specialize in mobile development for Android, with experience in building scalable and efficient applications. I have worked on projects ranging from educational apps to e-commerce solutions, using modern technologies such as Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, and Firebase.
